com.george.als.world
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  com.george.als.world.Map

public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

This calls holds all of the information about the current map It contains all the bugs, food, obctacles and nests on the map and is used to update each one. It also contains the methods for creating random maps for new configurations

Author:
Georges Beast
